  • Uses of ColorTimePoint in org.vanted.animation.interpolators

    Method parameters in org.vanted.animation.interpolators with type arguments of type ColorTimePoint
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Color Interpolator.interpolateColor​(double time, double loopDuration, int previousIndex, List<ColorTimePoint> dataPoints, Looper looper, ColorMode transitionMode)
    Colors can interpolate in special ways.
    It is recommended that you call this method instead of interpolate() to interpolate between values.
